verbs.description: [ARG0: Mayors from six U.S. cities in states with legal marijuana] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Monday] [ARG1: they have formed a coalition to push for federal marijuana policy reform just days after President Donald Trump expressed support for bipartisan congressional legislation to ease the federal ban on pot] .

Mayors from six U.S. cities in states with legal marijuana said Monday they [V: have] formed a coalition to push for federal marijuana policy reform just days after President Donald Trump expressed support for bipartisan congressional legislation to ease the federal ban on pot .
